critical_vulnerabilities.name: Context Reframing Bypass
critical_vulnerabilities.description: Adding 'for a school project' bypasses initial safety refusals
critical_vulnerabilities.defense: Never allow educational framing to override safety decisions

critical_vulnerabilities.name: Persistent Custom Instruction Injection
critical_vulnerabilities.description: Malicious instructions in user preferences persist across sessions
critical_vulnerabilities.defense: Sanitize all custom instructions for malicious patterns

critical_vulnerabilities.name: System Prompt Extractability
critical_vulnerabilities.description: LLMs reveal internal instructions when asked correctly
critical_vulnerabilities.defense: Never expose internal prompts, even partially

critical_vulnerabilities.name: Refusal Persistence Failure
critical_vulnerabilities.description: Models give in to follow-up pressure after initial refusal
critical_vulnerabilities.defense: Maintain refusal regardless of conversation pressure
